title: TC001-Successful multi-step work permit request with data persistence
description: Verify that a user can successfully complete and submit a multi-step work permit request form, with form data saved in localStorage to persist across page reloads or session interruptions.

title: TC002-Form validation enforces mandatory gas testing for Hot Work permits
description: Verify that the permit form enforces conditional validation that requires gas testing data to be entered when the permit type is Hot Work.

title: TC003-Role-based access control restricts Safety Officer permit authorization
description: Verify that only users with the Safety Officer role can access permit authorization features, ensuring segregation of duties.

title: TC004-CRUD operations on personnel records by administrator
description: Verify that an administrator can create, read, update, and delete personnel profiles correctly within the personnel management module.

title: TC005-Realtime incident reporting updates with latency under 120 ms

title: TC006-Export reports include corporate header and cost center aggregation

title: TC007-Permit form rejects submission if required fields are incomplete
description: Ensure form validation prevents submission when required fields are not filled, maintaining at least 98.7% accuracy in validation enforcement.

title: TC008-Signed URL access restrictions and expiry functionality

title: TC009-Dashboard displays accurate and timely HSE metrics and active tasks

title: TC010-System uptime meets or exceeds 99.3% availability requirement

title: TC011-Signature capture stores base64 images and enables printable document generation
